casebody.data:
DISCRETIONARY APPEALS ALLOWED

01-81. Univ. Hosp. of Cleveland v. Lynch.

Cuyahoga App. Nos. 77129 and 77134. Discretionary appeal and cross-appeal allowed.

F.E. Sweeney and Cook, JJ., dissent to the allowance of the discretionary cross-appeal.

On motion to strike notice of cross-appeal and memorandum in response and in support of cross-appeal. Motion denied.
